short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Works with your mobile PROXIMITY app.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This browser extension gives you the ability to retrieve account credentials from your existing PROXIMITY app on your iOS mobile device and auto sign-in to most websites.
